name: CRUSH! (itch)
description:
A behemoth grows to giant proportions and stomps a slime like it's an aluminum can.

Sample projects are included so you can review the action sequence and use in your game if you wish.

Required VisuStella plugins:

  • Core Engine
  • Battle Core
  • Action Sequences Camera

I also included the Options Core plugin in the project to fine-tune the options for the sample game, but it's not required for the action sequence.

Created for the Kicking AS - RPGM Action Sequence Jam # 2
